meanings.definition: A common wild duck (Anas platyrhynchos) of the Northern Hemisphere, the male of which has a dark green head and a white ring around its neck.
meanings.sent1: The mallard waddled by the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful mallard swimming gracefully in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The mallard quacked happily as it splashed in the water.
meanings.sent4: The mallard stood out among the other ducks with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted to feed the mallard at the park.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this duck, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using mallard meat.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a special dish made with mallard.
meanings.sent3: The mallard meat was so tasty that everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the mallard dish filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The mallard meat was tender and flavorful, a true delicacy.
